name: NLLanguageRecognizer
desc: The language of a body of text.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a recognizer that you can customize.

items.name: class func dominantLanguage(for: String) -> NLLanguage?
items.desc: Finds the most likely language of a piece of text.

items.name: func processString(String)
items.desc: Analyzes the piece of text to determine its dominant language.

items.name: var dominantLanguage: NLLanguage?
items.desc: The most likely language for the processed text.

items.name: func languageHypotheses(withMaximum: Int) -> [NLLanguage : Double]
items.desc: Generates the probabilities of possible languages for the processed text.

items.name: func reset()
items.desc: Resets the recognizer to its initial state.

items.name: var languageHints: [NLLanguage : Double]
items.desc: A dictionary that maps languages to their probabilities in the language identification process.

items.name: var languageConstraints: [NLLanguage]
items.desc: Limits the set of possible languages that the recognizer will return.
